properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CCR_CONTROL_COBROS_RECOBRO WHERE CCR_FECHA = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CCR_CONTROL_COBROS_RECOBRO WHERE CCR_FECHA BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT DISTINCT CPR.RCF_SCA_ID FROM CPR_COBROS_PAGOS_RECOBRO CPR WHERE CPR.CPA_FECHA BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM RCF_SCA_SUBCARTERA SCA WHERE SCA.RCF_SCA_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT TMP.RCF_SCA_ID FROM TMP_RECOBRO_DETALLE_FACTURA TMP)
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM TMP_RECOBRO_DETALLE_FACTURA WHERE RCF_SCA_ID = ?

INSERT INTO TMP_RECOBRO_DETALLE_FACTURA_CO (PFS_ID, CPA_ID, CNT_ID, EXP_ID, RCF_SCA_ID, RCF_AGE_ID, RDF_FECHA_COBRO, RDF_PORCENTAJE, RDF_IMPORTE_A_PAGAR, RCF_TCC_ID, RDF_IMP_CONCEP_FACTU, RDF_IMP_REAL_FACTU) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

INSERT INTO TMP_RECOBRO_DETALLE_FACTURA (PFS_ID, CPA_ID, CNT_ID, EXP_ID, RCF_SCA_ID, RCF_AGE_ID, RDF_FECHA_COBRO, RDF_PORCENTAJE, RDF_IMPORTE_A_PAGAR, RCF_TCC_ID, RDF_IMP_CONCEP_FACTU, RDF_IMP_REAL_FACTU) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

INSERT INTO RDF_RECOBRO_DETALLE_FACTURA(RDF_ID, CPA_ID, PFS_ID, CNT_ID, EXP_ID, RDF_FECHA_COBRO, RDF_PORCENTAJE, RDF_IMPORTE_A_PAGAR, RCF_TCC_ID, RDF_IMP_CONCEP_FACTU, RDF_IMP_REAL_FACTU, RCF_SCA_ID, RCF_AGE_ID, CPR_ID, USUARIOCREAR, FECHACREAR, BORRADO, VERSION) SELECT S_RDF_RECOBRO_DETALLE_FACTURA.nextVal, CPA_ID, PFS_ID, CNT_ID, EXP_ID, RDF_FECHA_COBRO, RDF_PORCENTAJE, RDF_IMPORTE_A_PAGAR, RCF_TCC_ID, RDF_IMP_CONCEP_FACTU, RDF_IMP_REAL_FACTU, RCF_SCA_ID, RCF_AGE_ID, CPR_ID, 'BATCH-FAC', sysdate, 0, 0 FROM TMP_RECOBRO_DETALLE_FACTURA_CO
INSERT INTO TMP_RECOBRO_DETALLE_FACTURA_CO SELECT * FROM TMP_RECOBRO_DETALLE_FACTURA WHERE RCF_SCA_ID = ?
